Name: ReMind VR: Daily Meditation
About the game: Repose and unwind with proven meditation techniques from three foremost experts in the field of relaxation therapy. Tranquilize your stressful day with simple, short exercises of requiescence: 'Let Go' - Release negative thought patterns and leave stress behind, so you can feel peaceful, happy and free. 'Drop the Habit' - Learn to remain focused and centered despite the presence of disruptive thoughts and feelings. 'Infinite Lightness' - A meditation to transform our perspective and enable the clearing of our modern multi-tasking mind. ReMind is a short daily exercise to help you realize wellness for your mind, body and soul.
